explanation: [0-0] A little girl in an orange school uniform and a dark blue skirt is standing in front of a cotton candy machine, holding a row of colorful sugars. Behind her stands a man with long hair in a blue T-shirt. The background wall is a white brick structure.

[0-9] Afterwards, the little girl begins to pour the sugar into the machine. The sugar is a mixture of various colors. The cotton candy machine starts to operate, the sugar is thrown onto the inner wall of the machine, gradually forming the filamentous structure of cotton candy, and the little girl is concentrating on operating it. The girl rolls a green cotton candy with a stick and takes off the orange cotton candy on her head.
